name: Dark Blue Warriorr
description:
game introduction
"Dark Blue Warriorr" is a deep-sea 2.5D barrage shooting Rogue Like game.

Game Features

1. The location where you enter the portal is random.

2. The monster species encountered are rich and diverse.

3. We can enrich our abilities.

Use W-A-S-D to control the main character's movements

Shoot with the left mouse button

A portal from Deep Blue appeared, and the protagonist of the warrior decided to walk into the portal to find out. Come on, warrior.
